extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

attributes.name: SupportedModes
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL contain the list of supported modes that may be selected for the CurrentMode attribute. Each item in this list represents a unique mode as indicated by the Mode field of the ModeOptionStruct.

attributes.name: CurrentMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the current mode of the server.

attributes.name: StartUpMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the desired startup mode for the server when it is supplied with power.

attributes.name: OnMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the value of CurrentMode depends on the state of the On/Off cluster on the same endpoint.
